title: patch problems
body: hello i was wondering if anyone could help me out after i update my league with new patch or even just little patch. i click on launch and it pops up the terms and agreement. i accept then comes up again then again. then nothing happens. then i hit launch again just does nothing i close out of league and repeat this over and over for about an hour then i might get lucky and it works. then everything is normal. does anyone know how to fix this problem so i dont have to deal with this

replies.body:
For clarification: You're actually getting the Terms of Use pop up, correct? It just doesn't go away when you hit "accept"?  To be honest, it's the first time I've heard of that particular issue.

From the way you've described it, I think the cause could be one of two issues:

1. The patcher is being blocked from completing the patch due to a permissions issue.
-For help in updating your permissions settings check out our article on [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

2. A connection error is causing the acceptance of Terms of Use to not register.
-To help address connection issues, follow the steps in our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) article

Really, I'd go ahead and try changing your permissions settings first as it's a much quicker process.  Let me know if either one of these steps help!
